Sentencas: The electrode microstructure plays an important role in determining the performance of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The conventional SOFC electrodes are based on two kinds of particles, one electron conducting and another ion conducting.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Over the years, electrodes with alternative microstructures have been proposed for performance enhancement based on the developments in materials and fabrication techniques.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Analytical models for the microstructure offer the scope of quick evaluation of the effect of various microstructural parameters on important microstructural properties like the triple phase boundary densities.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: However, validation of these models in the light of the experimental data is seldom reported.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: In this work, the microstructural data derived from image-based reconstruction of the electrodes is used to calibrate and validate an analytical model for the conventional SOFC electrode microstructure revealing insights into the model's applicability.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: This model forms the basis for the models of other modified microstructures studied in this work.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Designing of improved SOFC microstructures require an understanding of the effect of controllable parameters on the reaction sites.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in five different SOFC microstructures is performed in this work.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The results and insights will enable the selection of microstructural parameters for tailoring the electrode microstructure to achieve improved performance.
Titulo: Model based evaluation of the electrochemical reaction sites in solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
